name: Thindom
tagline: Simple library to create DOM elements really fast with chaining.
body:
ThinDOM: a thin DOM wrapper --------------------------- Inspired by jQuery, this simple library lets you create DOM elements really fast, with significantly more expressiveness than native DOM methods. ![How fast? Super fast.](http://i.imgur.com/nFw39JP.png) ## Usage 

captionDOM = ThinDOM div 
  .attr 'class', 'caption'
  .append ThinDOM 'div' 
  .attr 'class', 'votes'
  .append ThinDOM 'a' 
  .attr 'class': 'up', 'href': '#'
  .append ThinDOM 'a' 
  .attr 'class': 'down', 'href': '#'
  .append ThinDOM 'div'
  .attr 'class', 'meta'
  .append ThinDOM 'span'
  .text author + ' - '
  .append ThinDOM 'span'
  .text points + ' point' + plural
  .append ThinDOM 'p' 
  .html body 
  .get()
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
